citations.narrative:
A urine stained doe was housed with her weaned, urine stained litter of seven >10 week old juveniles in an 8 foot square
cage. This number of animals requires a minimum floor space of 26 square feet to ensure animals are kept clean and can
perform normal activities. The facility must ensure that animals have adequate floor space.
Correct by 07 August 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

A urine stained doe was housed with her weaned, urine stained litter of seven >10 week old juveniles in an 8 foot square 
cage. This number of animals requires a minimum floor space of 26 square feet to ensure animals are kept clean and can 
perform normal activities. The facility must ensure that animals have adequate floor space.
